title.narrative: OUTPUT 6.4: EMERGENCY COORDINATION, PREPARDNESS AND RESPONSE AND RESILENCE

description.narrative: Partners are well coordinated for multi-sectoral humanitarian assistance and have greater resilience capacity for crises., which contributes to Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance (Covid), Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Disaster Risk Reduction, Disaster Risk Reduction (Covid), Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2024, children, especially the poorest, the most excluded and those affected by crisis, have access to child-sensitive and shock- responsive social services, benefit from positive community practices and are empowered to be agents of change within their communities.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Partners are well coordinated for multi-sectoral humanitarian assistance and have greater resilience capacity for crises.

[Number of provinces with humanitarian surveillance systems supported by the Ministry of Solidarity and Humanitarian Action in collaboration with the Ministry of Social Affairs] Nombre de provinces avec des systmes de surveillance humanitaire soutenus par le ministre des Solidarits et de l'Action humanitaire en collaboration avec le ministre des Affaires sociales.

[Number of communities that have received UNICEF support to improve their access to basic social services AND to build capacity has managed the risks associated with crises.] Nombre de communauts qui ont reu un appui d'UNICEF pour amliorer leur accs aux services sociaux de base ET pour renforcer leur capacit a gr les risques associ aux crises.

[Number of UNICEF offices that have set up viable emergency preparedness plans including the 10 minimum preparation standards] Nombre de bureaux Unicef qui ont mis en place des plans de prparation aux urgences viables y inclus les 10 standards minimums de prparation.

[Number of clusters managed according to the six main coordination functions agreed by the IASC and which have supported the coordination of UNICEF emergency interventions] Nombre des clusters grs selon les six fonctions et principales de coordination convenues par l'IASC et qui ont appuy la coordination d'interventions d'urgences de l'UNICEF.
[Number of households and people receiving rapid multisectoral assistance.] Nombre de mnages et personnes recevant une assistance rapide multisectorielle.
